name: C-12: Final Resistance
summary: It is an action shooter set in a futuristic dystopian city on Earth overthrown by aliens. The game has two modes - third person and first person. Most of the time the player sees the character in third person, however the player can also see through the characterÂ´s eyes and shoot. However, the player cannot move the character while in the first person. The game is mission-based and it is strictly linear. The main enemies are aliens and cyborgs.

name: C14 Dating
summary: C-14 Dating is an otome dating sim that combines archaeology, friendships and love.

name: C15: Horror
summary: This is a simple horror game, with an additional cooperative mode and an easy story about a scientist and his experiment on the brain.

name: C1 Circuit
summary: C1 Circuit is a Racing game, developed and published by Invex, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: C17
summary: Use keyboard and mouse to control characters to avoid monster attacks
